attributes.action: Make Alcoholic Drinks Carry A Health and Social Warning.
attributes.additional_details: The information I have used to come to this conclusion can be found on many sites, including the Office for National Statics and other Alcohol concerned charities.
attributes.background:
I believe that alcohol should carry a health warning, as do cigarettes. 
Alcohol not only causes physical problems to people who consume it but also mental problems to themselves and the others around them.
